name: CryptobeerBrewery
description: Brewery production cryptobrew connected love to art with classic beer brewing and are now standing on the verge of a new phenomenon - cryptoart in beer making. In the production of beer, we do not use products of animal origin-this is the main credo of the brewery!Always open to experimenting with new ingredients and brewing styles, diluting "traditional" brewing with new trends, while respecting the culture and history of the classic and craft school of brewing schools. Serve beers fresh from the fermenting tanks in our brewery you can taste such a fresh beer almost directly from the beer tank. If you want to make a field trip and brewery tour with our staff exlanation, you need a reservation- so please contact us cryptobeerbrewery@gmail.com! Drink responsible, even if its art © 2021 all rights reserved http://cryptobeerbrewery.com/ We are in social networks: Airnfts https://app.airnfts.com/creators/0xAB2c3dd4C819121402339b8EBa63F6Dad55362C9 untappd – https://untappd.com/b/cryptobeerbrewery-dead-pixel-porter/4309485 twitter – https://twitter.com/BreweryCrypto instagram - https://www.instagram.com/cryptobeerbrewery/ telegram – https://t.me/cryptobeerbrewery Production itself - http://cryptobeerbrewery.com/
